attributes.action: Instruct the Football Association to punish Wayne Rooney for crowd incitement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wayne Rooney continually incites crowd trouble during Everton versus Manchester Utd matches, by standing in front of the Everton fans and goading them. We call upon the authorities to censure Rooney and prevent his actions causing serious crowd trouble.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
